Name: amvd
Overview: Automated Music Video Downloader :: AMVD is a Lidarr Companion script to automatically download and tag Music Videos for use in various media applications

enableautomaticscriptstart.Name: Enable Automatic Script Start
enableautomaticscriptstart.Description: true = Enabled :: Runs script automatically on startup

scriptinterval.Name: Script Interval
scriptinterval.Description: #s or #m or #h or #d :: s = seconds, m = minutes, h = hours, d = days :: Amount of time between each script run, when AUTOSTART is enabled

musicbrainzmirrorurl.Name: Musicbrainz Mirror URL
musicbrainzmirrorurl.Description: OPTIONAL: Only change if using a different mirror

musicbrainzratelimit.Name: Musicbrainz Rate Limit
musicbrainzratelimit.Description: OPTIONAL: musicbrainz rate limit, musicbrainz allows only 1 connection per second, max setting is 10

musicvideossourceconnection.Name: Music Videos Source Connection
musicvideossourceconnection.Description: lidarr or ama :: ama requires the AMA config folder to be mounted as a volume: /ama

lidarrurl.Name: Lidarr Url
lidarrurl.Description: Set domain or IP to your Lidarr instance including port. If using reverse proxy, do not use a trailing slash. Ensure you specify http/s.

musicvideoscountrycode.Name: Music Videos Country Code
musicvideoscountrycode.Description: Set the country code for preferred video matching, uses Musicbrainz Country Codes, lowercase only.

musicvideosrequirematch.Name: Music Videos Require Match
musicvideosrequirematch.Description: true = enabled :: Only keep videos that could be matched to a Musicbrainz music track.

musicvideossubtitlelangauge.Name: Music Videos Subtitle Langauge
musicvideossubtitlelangauge.Description: Desired Language Code :: For guidence, please see youtube-dl documentation

musicvideosfiltermatch.Name: Music Videos Filter Match
musicvideosfiltermatch.Description: This will filter out videos Matching MusicBrainz secondary release type and album disambiguation (single word only)

musicvideoswritenfo.Name: Music Videos Write NFO
musicvideoswritenfo.Description: true = enabled :: Create NFO and Local Thumbnail for use in applications such as Kodi

musicvideosusefolders.Name: Music Videos Use Folders
musicvideosusefolders.Description: true = enabled :: Creates subfolders using the Lidarr Artist folder name

musicvideosusevideofolders.Name: Music Videos Use Video Folders
musicvideosusevideofolders.Description: true = enabled :: Creates subfolders using Video File Name only, requires USEFOLDERS to be enabled
